title: Pot roast sirloin beef in a rich red wine jus
ingredients: ['1kg joint of sirloin beef', '4 onions', '2 carrots', '3 cloves garlic', '120ml brown stock', '200ml red wine, divided', '1 sprig of thyme', '1 sprig of rosemary', '2 bay leaves', '1 tbsp vegetable oil', 'salt and pepper', '250ml demi-glace']
